name: Artista - The Slugger by Big Papi - Robusto
brand: Artista, The Slugger by Big Papi
additionalNotes:
Big Papi is back with a BIG follow up to the wildly popular Big Papi cigar! After years of incredible popularity, and much consideration, David Ortiz in conjunction with Artista presents a wholly new blend to round out the Big Papi Cigar line-up. Ortiz swings for the fences with an EXTRA LARGE Gordo
